title: Traditional paddy rice cultivation emits methane

content.question: Which of the following represents a correct pairing of an agricultural practice with its environmental consequence?

choices.label: Paddy rice cultivation and methane emissions
Plowing under cover crops and nutrient depletion
Organic corn cultivation and pesticide accumulation
No-till farming and increased soil erosion
Planting vegetated buffers on stream banks and increased levels of nonpoint-source pollution

content.answer: Paddy rice cultivation and methane emissions

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
